params.controlledToken: The type of token to be minted in exchange (i.e. tickets or sponsorship)
params.prizePool: The prize pool to deposit into
params.referrer: The address that referred the deposit
params.to: The address that will receive the controlled tokens

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

permitAndDepositTo(address,address,uint2.details: The Dai permit params match the Dai#permit function, but it expects the `spender` to be the address of this contract.

params.allowed: If true, then the spender is approving holder the max allowance.  False makes the allowance zero.
params.controlledToken: The type of token to be minted in exchange (i.e. tickets or sponsorship)
params.expiry: The timestamp at which the sig expires
params.nonce: The nonce of the tx.  Should be retrieved from the Dai token
params.prizePool: The prize pool to deposit into
params.referrer: The address that referred the deposit
params.to: The address that will receive the controlled tokens

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Allows users to approve and deposit dai into a prize pool in a single transaction.

depositTo(address,address,address,uint25.notice: Deposits into a Prize Pool from the sender.  Tokens will be transferred from the sender then deposited into the Pool on the sender's behalf.  This can be called after permitAndDepositTo is called, as this contract will have full approval for a user.

permitAndDepositTo(address,address,uint2.notice: Permits this contract to spend on a users behalf, and deposits into the prize pool.
